visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent the monthly average temperature for a year. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and it includes custom styling for the title, axes, and labels. The title and axis titles have specific font sizes and colors, enhancing readability. The data series represents the monthly average temperature for a year, with custom colors applied to the series. Additional configurations include setting the chart margins, background color, and enabling the legend with custom styling. This setup ensures a visually appealing and informative chart.
